text: @abbydphillip @DJJudd Wow, its amazing! The coronavirus is still active EVEN n the Whitehouse, but he’s more concerned about campaigning than being a President & allowing the epidemiologist give speeches to advise the WORLD what ea need to do to stop the continuing growth of this virus!!!
